item.title: RandQm Era [Back to the 2006 private servers]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:19, topic:421286”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=523948.msg3815675#msg3815675 date=1321315056]

What about the Delta.

I consider that newfag era.

Nothing was better then running out the bank to pick up the 1m on the ground, hoping not to get barraged by the people who logged onto the server 2 hours ago just so u can mass click a door where people will yell at you to “stop massing, you’re lagging the server”, so you can finally get the stats to barrage people who just logged in. Yes, remake the old days, please.

lulz It’s not the plan to bring the negs back.
It’s a pretty descent source
[/quote]
…negs?[/quote]
negative things of the old servers,
it will be the old gameplay but not the old server source

I do have phonescape (: but will not use it

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Artesia:

honestly in my opinion this idea is kind of bad its like a 2006 server because a lot of people hate the old items and have fallen in love with all new items things and shit like that… Me personally thought i love 2006 servers cause its the only time i could have fun pking without gay shit happening but other than that all’s i can say is good luck we’ll see how this turns out.

There are still enough servers created without all those new items
more people than u think love oldschool
